author: FRONTLINE PBS | Official
description:
Watch the opening scene of "The Rise of RFK Jr.," a new documentary on how a scion of one of America’s most storied Democratic families ended up a powerful player in the MAGA movement and President Donald Trump’s administration, and is now reshaping government and public health.

This journalism is made possible by viewers like you. Support your local PBS station here: https://www.pbs.org/donate​

"The Rise of RFK Jr." premieres in full Tues., Oct. 21, 2025 on PBS stations, in the PBS App and here on @frontline's YouTube channel. Learn more: https://to.pbs.org/48FUyMK

“The Rise of RFK Jr.” is a FRONTLINE production with Kirk Documentary Group, Ltd. The director is Michael Kirk. The writers are Michael Kirk & Mike Wiser. The producers are Michael Kirk, Mike Wiser, Vanessa Fica and Elliott Choi. The reporters are Vanessa Fica and Brooke Nelson Alexander. The editor-in-chief and executive producer of FRONTLINE is Raney Aronson-Rath.

#politics #trump #rfkjr 

Subscribe on YouTube: https
title: How the ‘Unthinkable’ Alliance Between RFK Jr. and Donald Trump Came to Be | FRONTLINE
